name: KIUBI
description:
Kiubi is an elegant and innovative 3D freerunning openworld platform developed with Unity and shaped by the help of its community.

We started developing Kiubi by questioning everything we knew about platforms and testing new ways to navigate through the world and new ways to MOVE.

Through this research we are developing the first Freerunning Openworld Platform, but we still miss something: YOU!

Kiubi is still a prototype, as we will need your support in order to complete the game: so if you want to be part of all of this, download the demo and join our Discord Channel to share your feedback with us!  ►  https://discord.gg/6freEevFAq

Key Features:

  •  A unique openworld neon environment  you can fully explore.
  • Awesome synthwave original music composed by ATW Audio Production.
  • Different abilities you can unlock by completing exciting challenges.
  • Two game modes for over 1 hour of content... and this is JUST THE BEGINNING
